main.name: Rameshver
main.description: I am a web development engineer and I use react and python to develop pages. This project is a resume template that can be used as the project home page or resume page
main.bio: My Name is Rameshver. I am from Meerut, UP. I have done my 12th schooling from JNV Rangareddy and 10th schooling from JNV Meerut. Currently, I am pursuing a  Btech degree from IIT Jodhpur with the department of computer science and Engineering. My interest and skill include competitive coding in C++ and web development and app development in ReactJs. I am a 4* CodeChef coder. I have done an internship in the domain of web development and app development using React.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.
